item.title: O
item.description: score:-74 Chances: Wealthy investors allocate a meaningful percentage of their portfolio to real estate. If you’re looking for income-paying stocks, these two have proven dividend growth track records and strong businesses. Real estate investment trusts are an easier path to producing passive income.
